event.title: was incorporated as a village in 1893

data.event: Newcastle was incorporated as a village in 1893, soon after the Chicago, St. Paul, Minneapolis and Omaha Railway was extended to that point.

event.title: washed into the river in the 1870s, and today

data.event: Much of the so-called volcano washed into the river in the 1870s, and today the site is more than a mile from the river.
